Tev50 was a blast man!  I loved the town where you could go into 
houses.  There were a few problems with some levels (fighters 
couldn't navigate the labyrinth, I didn't care for the invincible 
mage level, and protecting the prisoners on the second to last level 
was tough), but it was a great game overall.  :)  I'll write a plot 
if you want.

Mark
